subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: With Yao Ming out with an injured left foot, China had little chance against the United States. LeBron James scored 22 points and Carmelo Anthony added 18 yesterday to lead the Americans to a 119-73 victory over China in Guangzhou. China trailed by 5 points after the first quarter, but the United States increased the margin to 23 at halftime.
